item.title: A client question
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

The Disciple:

How is it that I make the cmd box for the client close/hide? I’ve played a couple servers with this, but I have no idea how I’d do it without making the entire client close as well.

edit your run.bat

add start infront of the first line and w after java
EXAMPLE

@echo off
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar EGUI
pause

becomes

@echo off
Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar EGUI
exit
